name: Domination Kamidere
text: Command Phase: Spend 2 {BOND} to choose an enemy waifu; it must attack a target you pick this turn. Dere: Opponents can't ready more than one waifu during End Phase. Extreme: When you issue a command, ready one of your waifus.

do.note: Force chosen attack target this turn
Limit ready actions to 1 while mood>=Dere
If mood=Extreme, ready a waifu you control after issuing command

flavor: Kneel now and the world might spare you.
